price: It will cause the sky to break asunder[6]. His promise will certainly be fulfilled.
arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا
footnotes: [6] Out of the terror of that Day.
